scripts.start:dev: set NODE_ENV=development && nodemon --watch server --exec babel-node -- server/index.js
scripts.crack: npm i --save-dev babel-plugin-transform-decorators-legacy react redux url-loader webpack babel-loader babel-preset-env babel-preset-react babel-preset-stage-0 css-loader node-sass nodemon react-hot-loader redux-devtools-extension redux-thunk sass-loader style-loader webpack-dev-middleware webpack-hot-middleware babel-plugin-transform-runtime react-router-dom react-dom file-loader react-redux
